knimeNode.name: Strings To Document
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the specified strings to documents.

fullDescription.intro: Converts the specified strings to documents. For each row a document will be created and attached to that row. The strings of the specified columns will be used as title, authors, and full text. Furthermore the defined category, source, type, and date will be set.
fullDescription.option: If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as title.
The column containing the string which is used as title. (if "Use title from column" is checked, otherwise a default title will be generated).
The column containing the string which is used as text.
If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as author(s).
The column containing the string which is split up and used as author names. (if "Use authors from column" is checked, otherwise a default author will be generated).
The string separating the author names.
The source which is set to all documents (if "Use sources from column" is not checked).
If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as document sources.
The column containing the string used as source. No source is set for missing values.
The category which is set to all documents (if "Use categories from column" is not checked).
If checked, the string values of the specified column will be used as document categories.
The column containing the string used as category. No category is set for missing values.
The type which is set to all documents.

The publication as which is set to all documents. The date has to be formatted like "dd-mm-yyy". Two digits to specify the day, two to specify the month and four to specify the year. The specified date has to be a valid date.

ports.inPort: An input data table containing string cells.ht
ports.outPort: An output table containing the strings of the data of the input table as well as the created documents in an additional column.
